title: OCE LCS
body:
We need this in oce to let players shine and to give us a chance with our play style.

Would be the exact same as eu or na.{{summoner:2}} just see what im talking about

replies.body: OCE isnt developed enough to have it really. U know when u see those random teams in the LCS that get %%%% on by everyone? That would be us.

We have one, its not very good and the commentary puts me off watching it, but its there...

The OCE team made it to the final of the wildcard tournament for WORLDS. It could have been OCE being demolished every game instead of Dark Passage.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/2015-oceanic-competitive-season

Riot Games Oceania on Twitch

http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania
